title: If you don't honor a teammate after a game you will be put on a losing team
body:
I have played more than 500 games over multiple accounts and I have figured with my play consistent if you do not honor a teammate after a game you have a 24% chance winning the game compared o my 57% chance of winning a ranked game.

if you would like the statistics in excel format I would be more than happy to post the results.  

This evidence shows that RIOT is pairing better players with who honor those of teamamtes.

I'd like to see the data though, and see how valid your claim of "better players" is.
wow riot is rigging the matchmaking imagine my surprise
